entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 2:27PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Natrona County through 300 PM MDT... At 226 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hole In The Wall, which is also 18 miles southwest of Kaycee, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail.
